Comments_List: I've learned how to work in a lab and have made meaningful discoveries.
I gained a deeper understanding of how infant research works and I understood a little more what it takes to develop a research project.
I love doing research, and it's great that you can get credit.
A strength of the course was it gave me hands on experience with research that really related to what I have been learning in my classes. A weakness was it could be a little boring at times.
Absolutely! It's been a fantastic experience.
I would totally recommend doing research to another student, especially if they want to get a BS, as you get hands on before your senior year.
I would recommend this! Research is so valuable in understanding and researchers are so open and available to help undergraduates in my experience.
There is no better experience than doing hands-on research.
